cd /projects/afodor_research/jyoung/srascripts
cd /nobackup/afodor_research/datasets/rifaximin/jyoung/R1/

ls -l --block-size=M

module load sra-tools

gzip -r /nobackup/afodor_research/datasets/rifaximin/jyoung/R1 -v

# Run 1 (1:50)
 nohup sh sradownload.sh SRR5799796,SRR5799797,SRR5799798,SRR5799799,SRR5799800,SRR5799801,SRR5799802,SRR5799803,SRR5799804,SRR5799805,SRR5799806,SRR5799807,SRR5799808,SRR5799809,SRR5799810,SRR5799811,SRR5799812,SRR5799813,SRR5799814,SRR5799815,SRR5799816,SRR5799817,SRR5799818,SRR5799819,SRR5799820,SRR5799821,SRR5799822,SRR5799823,SRR5799824,SRR5799825,SRR5799826,SRR5799827,SRR5799828,SRR5799829,SRR5799830,SRR5799831,SRR5799832,SRR5799833,SRR5799834,SRR5799835,SRR5799836,SRR5799837,SRR5799838,SRR5799839,SRR5799840,SRR5799841,SRR5799842,SRR5799843,SRR5799844,SRR5799845 &

# Run 2 (51:100)
sh sradownload.sh SRR5799846,SRR5799847,SRR5799848,SRR5799849,SRR5799850,SRR5799851,SRR5799852,SRR5799853,SRR5799854,SRR5799855,SRR5799856,SRR5799857,SRR5799858,SRR5799859,SRR5799860,SRR5799861,SRR5799862,SRR5799863,SRR5799864,SRR5799865,SRR5799866,SRR5799867,SRR5799868,SRR5799869,SRR5799870,SRR5799871,SRR5799872,SRR5799873,SRR5799874,SRR5799875,SRR5799876,SRR5799877,SRR5799878,SRR5799879,SRR5799880,SRR5799881,SRR5799882,SRR5799883,SRR5799884,SRR5799885,SRR5799886,SRR5799887,SRR5799888,SRR5799889,SRR5799890,SRR5799891,SRR5799892,SRR5799893,SRR5799894,SRR5799895
